name: Quality Control (Magicow, TheRebelWolf)
description:
Long Haul

noun

a prolonged and difficult effort or task.

Welcome to Quality Control, where you are a factory employee, tasked with inspecting each and every product that passes you by. Work is hard, long, and boring, but be careful, the bosses stop by every 15 minutes to make sure you’re doing your work properly. 1 strike and you’re out, that’s not too hard… right?

Featuring the Desert Bus Gamemode: Was work not long and boring enough? Good, cause we’ve got even longer shifts, just for you!
